nodes.text: Natho was a Twi'lek male worker who joined the Balmorran resistance during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

During the battle on Balmorra, he secretly worked at a Imperial-controlled Okara Droid Factory and planned on making the droids turn against the Empire and fight on the Republic's side. He tasked a Republic spacer to use the transmitter on the relay droids outside the factory and upload the virus.
